thread.title: Thomas Scholefield

author: Thomas Scholefield
title: Thomas Scholefield
text: Digestizyme and peppermint oil give me relief from the symptoms of IBS before and after eating. Having used these products before I was aware that using them again would give the relief I needed. I have no hesitation in recommending Natures Best. Relief began within two days of receiving the products which arrived very quickly after ordering. ( A few years ago I was prescribed proprietary medication by my doctor and after a week of using I didn't feel any hint of improvement)
